"Xitrae": "Sorry to contact you out of nowhere like this. I'm Xitrae, from the ARKS Supply Corps."
"I'm here as part of a plan to make ARKS leaner, meaner and tougher so we can take on even stronger enemies."
"Could you come see me so we can talk about it?"
